name: Project M.O.L.E.
description:
The CIA has accidentally released robots that are too smart to listen to humankind. The CIA has now issued Project M.O.L.E. to clean up the robots. You are one of these robots issued in Project M.O.L.E. to stop the destruction of the Earth.

Made for the Wowie 4 Game Jam.

Credits:

George Weichel

All the people who kindly playtested
